title: ImportExportModels
description: runtime import mesh, assemble mesh, then ,export mesh
longDescription:
*Runtime Import model(Many file formats are supported, supported file formats(3DS,BLEND (Blender),DAE/Collada,FBX,IFC-STEP,ASE,DXF,HMP,MD2,MD3,MD5,MDC,MDL,NFF,PLY,STL,X,OBJ,OpenGEX,SMD,LWO,LXO,LWS,TER,AC3D,MS3D,COB,Q3BSP,XGL,CSM,BVH,B3D,NDO,Ogre Binary,Ogre XML,Q3D,ASSBIN (Assimp custom format),glTF (partial),3MF))

*Export the combination of models imported at runtime(FBX)

*Easy to use

*Based on the third-party library assimp
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • Almost supports all types of model files(Many file formats are supported, supported file formats(3DS,BLEND (Blender),DAE/Collada,FBX,IFC-STEP,ASE,DXF,HMP,MD2,MD3,MD5,MDC,MDL,NFF,PLY,STL,X,OBJ,OpenGEX,SMD,LWO,LXO,LWS,TER,AC3D,MS3D,COB,Q3BSP,XGL,CSM,BVH,B3D,NDO,Ogre Binary,Ogre XML,Q3D,ASSBIN (Assimp custom format),glTF (partial),3MF))
  • Runtime import then export(FBX)
  • Easy to use
  • Move, scale, rotate the model at runtime

Code Modules: (Please include a full list of each Plugin module and their module type (Runtime, Editor etc.))

  • Â ImportExportModels(Runtime)
